amendment.description: At the end of the bill, add the following new section: SEC. 3. CONSTRUCTION. Nothing in this Act***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 115-95 to specify that nothing in the bill shall impact the mandatory deposit requirements of title 17.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Chu, Judy amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Chu, Judy.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
